content:
363 
 
  
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
       NB  
 Note, one (1) Home Economics subject is required i.eFoods 
and Nutrition, Home Management or Textile and 
Clothing.  
(ix) UNN requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes which must 
include any two (2) of the following: Home  
Management, Clothing and Textiles, Food  and 
Nutrition, Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Agricultural 
Science, Economics, Cosmetology, Garment Making 
and Catering Craft at ‘O’ level plus the UNN UTME 
requirements.  
(x) ABSU requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes to include 
English Language, Mathemati cs, Biology or Chemistry 
and any two (2) other subjects  
(xi) TASUED requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes or NTC/ 
NBC credits at one (1) sitting or six (6) ‘O’ level/NTC or 
NBC credit passes at two (2) sittings including English  
Language, Mathematics and any other subject from  
FoodandNutrition, Home Management, Clothing and 
Textile, Agricultural Science, Biology, Economics, Health 
Education and Chemistry. 'O' level pass in Chemistry is 
required.  
(xii) EDOMOK requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes which 
must include English Language and any two (2) of the 
following Home Management, Clothing and Textile, 
Food and Nutrition, Biology, Chemistry, Agricultural 
Science and Economics.  
(xiii) BSU requires ‘O’ level credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics,Biology and any two (2) of thefollowing 
subjects: HomeManagement, Clothing andTextiles 
Food and Nutrition,Chemistry, Agricultural Science and 
Economics.  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
(i) IAUED requires one (1) Science subject and any other 
subjects.
